Reviews.Title: “Charming Hotel”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel daniel 3 nights following cruise clean staff lovely helpful friendly arrived morning grateful decor charming detail lace edged liners cupboards breakfast included bonus cappuccinos lounge short walk champs elysees hotel drivers pick airport dropoff reliable courteous wouldnt hesitate recommending lovely hotel
